gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 125, Hawks 114
gameRecap.excerpt: The 76ers defeated the Hawks, 125-114. Joel Embiid recorded 38 points, 14 rebounds, and four blocks for the 76ers, with Tyrese Maxey adding 30 points and seven assists in the victory. DeAndre Hunter tallied 24 points and seven rebounds for the Hawks in the losing effort. The 76ers improve to 14-7 in the regular season, while the Hawks fall to 9-12.
